### Description:
In this session you will be introduced to the purpose of serosurveillance research and programs and will go over the COVID-19 serological surveys that have been conducted in PNG.

### <i class="fas fa-calendar-alt"></i> Session details:
10th March 2022, 09:00-09:30am GMT+10

### <i class="fas fa-book-open"></i> Materials:

*Note: this session includes unpublished data, so to maintain confidentiality the materials will be provided to participants directly.*
